name: Codigo Secreto Lucybel: Evilution
overview: Codigo Secreto Lucybel: Evilution is a Spanish language text adventure written in 2007 by Josep Coletas Caubet. It is one of the three games in the Codigo Secreto (Spanish for Secret Code) Lucybel series. One more day in New Detroit for Lucybel. And a dark one. The title of this second instalment of the trilogy is very well chosen. "Evilution". Our favourite mercenary will discover something. Something that has evolved... badly!
